subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: With his teammates floundering and the home crowd grumbling, Kobe Bryant led Los Angeles from a 20-point third-quarter deficit to a rousing victory over the Spurs.
snippet: With his teammates floundering and the home crowd grumbling, Kobe Bryant led Los Angeles from a 20-point third-quarter deficit to a rousing victory over the Spurs.
